## nodeInputRule variable

Creates an node input rule based on the provided regex for the provided node type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
nodeInputRule: ({ regexp, type, getAttrs, updateSelection }: NodeInputRuleParams) => InputRule<any>
```
